text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt where modified = false and modifier = false
  • Include codes from http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt where modified = true

name: AmaCPTUsableCodes
title: AMA CPT Usable Codes
description: All CPT codes (no modifiers) that represent procedure codes (e.g. for Procedure.code).
